1.title: And You Thought There Is Never a Girl Online?

episode of.title: Netoge no yome wa onnanoko ja nai to omotta? (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

1.plot: Hardcore otaku Hideki Nishimura enjoys playing a net game with other members of his online guild, and finally agrees to marry one within the game. However, when he finally meets his "wife" in real life, she is not exactly what he expects.

2.title: I Thought We Couldn't Play Net Games at School?

episode of.title: Netoge no yome wa onnanoko ja nai to omotta? (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

2.plot: Having met his other in-game guild members in real life, Hideki begins to picture them in their characters' places. Ako's behavior at school the next day makes it clear that she has trouble separating the game from reality.

3.title: I Thought Net Games and Reality Were Different?

episode of.title: Netoge no yome wa onnanoko ja nai to omotta? (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

3.plot: During their first club meeting, Akane is delighted by her faster machine, Ako gets a lesson in dressing for the occasion, and Kyoh is prevented from using her premium equipment. However, the line between game and reality becomes more blurred.

4.title: I Thought Her Secret Wasn't Going to Get Out?

episode of.title: Netoge no yome wa onnanoko ja nai to omotta? (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

4.plot: When its members admit that sometimes the line between the game and reality becomes blurred for them, Saito considers the possibility of dissolving the club. The others try to help Ako deal with unwanted attention from her classmates.

5.title: I Thought Reincarnating Would Give Me My Big Chance?

episode of.title: Netoge no yome wa onnanoko ja nai to omotta? (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

5.plot: Ako asks to play a different game during the club meeting, and Kyou suggests a first-person shooter. Ako feels threatened when she thinks Nanako is interested in Hideki, and withdraws from both school and her friends.

6.title: I Thought If I Declared My Love, I Was Sure to Succeed?

episode of.title: Netoge no yome wa onnanoko ja nai to omotta? (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

6.plot: Hideki is nervous about revealing his true feelings for Ako before summer vacation. When the first term's final exams draw near, everyone rallies behind Ako, who is in danger of flunking the term, in order to make sure that she passes.

7.title: I Thought If I Went to the Beach, I Would Become a Normie?

episode of.title: Netoge no yome wa onnanoko ja nai to omotta? (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

7.plot: The club members hold their summer club camp at a cottage by the sea, with the provision that for 24 hours, none of them are allowed to connect to the net. The others try to make the camp a memorable experience for Ako.

8.title: I Thought I Was Giving Up Being a Net Game Husband?

episode of.title: Netoge no yome wa onnanoko ja nai to omotta? (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

8.plot: When Hideki is dumped out of his game of Legendary Age and cannot get back in, he soon realizes that his account has been hijacked by someone else. However, before he can do anything to stop them, the damage is already done.

9.title: I Thought If We Stayed Over, We Would Get Along Better?

episode of.title: Netoge no yome wa onnanoko ja nai to omotta? (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

9.plot: To persuade Ako to get cracking on her summer vacation homework, the girls have a study session sleepover at Kyoh's gigantic house. However, without Hideki around to keep Ako under control, things soon get out of hand.

10.title: I Thought We Would Do Our Best at the Cultural Festival?

episode of.title: Netoge no yome wa onnanoko ja nai to omotta? (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

10.plot: The Net Game Club members find that they are obliged to take part in the upcoming school culture festival. However, they are at a loss as to what presentation to make, until Kyoh has an idea that coincides with Legendary Age's fall update.

11.title: I Thought We Could Win By Delegating to Others?

episode of.title: Netoge no yome wa onnanoko ja nai to omotta? (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

11.plot: Rusian and the others include Nekohime and Sette, and recruit the top-ranked PvP guild "Wallenstein" to bolster their ranks. With the additional help, Guild Alley Cats charges in to take over Fort Cantor, but not everything goes according to plan.

12.title: My Net Game Wife Is a Girl Online!

episode of.title: Netoge no yome wa onnanoko ja nai to omotta? (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

12.plot: It is the last day of siege warfare before the culture festival, so Rusian and the others must take over and hold their fort until the end of gameplay so that they can take their screenshot. Will they be able to hold out long enough?

imdb.plot outline: Hideki Nishimura, who plays the game Legendary Age under the alias Rusian, swore off online marriages after confessing to a girl who claimed to be a guy in real-life. Two years later, the persistence of Ako, another Legendary Age player who is in the same guild as him, wore him down, and he agreed to an in-game marriage with her. When he finally meets up with the rest of his guild members, he is shocked to discover that not only are they all, in fact, female, but that they all attend the same school as him.
imdb.title: Netoge no yome wa onnanoko ja nai to omotta?
